name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Carouge | Streamline reselling: save, create, and cross-list in seconds.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Post listings to Poshmark and other reseller platforms from Carouge

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Carouge brings the future of circular fashion directly to your fingertips. Effortlessly track, manage, and resell your fashion collection across multiple platforms with just a few clicks. Whether you're shopping, selling, or simply organizing your wardrobe, Carouge is the ultimate tool to help you make smarter, more sustainable fashion choices.

Carouge Chrome Extension:

WHILE YOU SHOP

📊 Instant Resale Price Estimates: View real-time resale values for every item you're shopping for, powered by data from millions of live listings.
🧥 Create Your Digital Wardrobe: Instantly add items to your collection with one click—no more forgotten purchases.

AFTER YOU SHOP

💸 Maximize Your Resale Potential: Make informed resale decisions by comparing commission rates across top platforms like Poshmark, Vestiaire Collective and 6 others.
⚡ AI-Powered Listing Creation: Generate professional-quality listings in seconds and post them to Poshmark and other platforms with ease.

Carouge gives you more:
    •    TIME — with AI generated listing descriptions
    •    MONEY — with automated price suggestions and accurate commission estimates across every platform

More Features, More Control:
📚 Unlimited Digital Wardrobe: Free users can record and organize an unlimited number of items in their digital archive.
🗂️ Collection View: Organize and filter your wardrobe by type, season, and more.
🔖 Tags Functionality: Easily categorize your items by season, outfit types, and more.
💳 Affordable Pricing: Paid accounts start at just $6/month, unlocking unlimited listings and more advanced features.

Ready for Effortless Fashion Resale?
Install the Carouge Chrome Extension now to start managing your wardrobe and monetizing your wardrobe.

For more information, visit: https://carouge.app
